I need to see a doctor: I need to go to the hospital

Potrebno mi je vozilo hitne pomoći (Trebam kola hitne pomoći).

I need to see a doctor: Where can I fill this prescription?
Gdje mogu podići lijek (lek) za ovaj recept?

I need to see a doctor: When do I have to come back?
Kada moram opet doći (kada moram opet da dođem)?

I need to see a doctor: Do I have to be admitted to the hospital?

Imao (m) / imala (f) sam infarkt / srčani udar.
Imam bolest srpastih stanica (anemiju srpastih ćelija).

I need to see a doctor: I take this medication every day
I have been taking this medication for years
I need more of this medication
I was stabbed/ cut with a knife
I was hit by a car
I was stung by an insect
Ubo me kukac. (Pretrpeo (m) / pretrpela (f) sam ubod insekta.)
Osjećam bol na ovom dijelu tijela. (Na ovom me mestu boli.)

I need to see a doctor: The pain started here and goes to here
Bol migrira s ovog na onaj dio tijela. (Bol se pomera s ovog na onaj dio tela.)

I need to see a doctor: The pain is there all the time
It hurts when I touch it
It gets worse when I stand up
It gets worse when I lie down

Bol je došla iznenada. (Iznenada me je zabolelo).
Polako me počelo boljeti (Polako je počelo da me boli.)

I need to see a doctor: I have had this pain before
Ovakvu sam bol osjećao (m) / osjećala (f) i ranije. (I pre me je ovde bolelo.)

I need to see a doctor: I have never had this pain before
Ovakvu bol još nikada nisam osjetio (m) / osjetila (f). (Ovde/ovo me još nikada nije bolelo.)

I need to see a doctor: There is blood in my urine
There is blood in my faeces
There is blood in my vomit
I am bleeding from my anus
I am bleeding between my periods
My periods finished, but I am bleeding again
Menopauza mi je završila, ali krvarim i dalje.
Onesvijestio sam se (m) / Onesvijestila sam se (f). (Pao (m) /pala (f) sam u nesvest.)
Osjećam bol u prsima (Osećam bol u grudima).

I need to see a doctor: I vomit up all food and drinks
Povratim sve što popijem i pojedem.

I need to see a doctor: I have colic pain in my side
I am pregnant and I am bleeding
I last had sex 2 days ago
Zadnji spolni odnos imao (m) /imala (f) sam prije (pre) 2 dana.

I need to see a doctor: I have not had sex for a long time
Već duže vrijeme (vreme) nisam imao (m) / imala (f) spolni odnos.

I need to see a doctor: I have a discharge from my vagina
I have a discharge from my urethra
Imam iscjedak iz mokraćne cijevi (sekret iz mokraćnog otvora).
Ne osjećam (osećam)... (Obamro mi je taj dio tela.)
Strah me. / Bojim se. / Plašim se.

I need to see a doctor: I hear voices when i am alone
Čujem glasove kada sam sam (m) / sama (f.).

I need to see a doctor: I feel like I'm being watched
Imam osjećaj  da me nadziru (Imam osećaj da me neko posmatra).

NEED_DOCTOR: Läuse, Filzläuse, Magenwürmer, Karies, blaue Flecken, Verstauchung, Kater, diverse Drogen, Tinnitus, trockener Mund, Rheuma, Seitenstechen, Prellung, Beule, Quetschugn, Verbrennung
Steifheit, Unterkühlung, Hitzschlag, Sonnenbrand, Sonnenstich, Gehirnerschütterung, Ertrinken und Verwandtes, Erstickung und Verwandtes, Schnittwunden, Brüche
